b'Anonymous Confession #2116
Hai semua.. Ada seorang lelaki ni, bila diteliti dia ada ciri-ciri lelaki psiko.
Antara Ciri Ciri Lelaki Psycho
1. Rajin Monitor. Setiap jam dia selalu menelefon untuk mencari tahu secara detail apa yang Anda lakukan saat itu, bersama siapa, dan sebagainya. Bila telefonnya tidak dijawab, ia akan menelofon Anda hingga diangkat.
2. Berbohong Tentang Masa Lalu. Ketika membicarakan bekas girlfriend, dia selalu memposisikan diri sebagai objek penderita. Dia akan berbual tentang bekasnya yang bermasalah, dan bagaimana dia disakiti oleh mereka.
3. Mengorek rahsia dari Keluarga dan Kawan-kawan. Tanpa meminta izin dan tidak melibatkan Anda, dia sering bertanya kawan-kawan anda tentang anda, dan menelefon ibu Anda berjam-jam. Kelihatannya Dia ingin mencari tahu tentang Anda, tapi Anda tidak pernah tahu motif dia.
4. Berdebat di Muka Umum. Dia tidak boleh memilih-milih tempat untuk bertengkar, bahkan Dia kerap mengkritik Anda di depan keluarga dan kawan-kawan.
5. Sikapnya Susah Diramal. Dia boleh tiba-tiba marah dan berteriak pada Anda tanpa alasan. Lepas tu dia jadi watak supermanis.
6. Rajin Bohong. Dia biasa berbohong tentang apa saja, besar atau kecil, dan kadang2 tanpa alasan.
7. Sentiasa memeriksa Anda. Di matanya, Anda tidak pernah benar. DIa selalu ingin tahu mengapa Anda terlambat 10 menit. Dia akan menanya soalan kepada Anda semalaman untuk memuaskan keingintahuannya.
8. Memata-Matai. Awalnya ia akan melakukan invasi terhadap privasi Anda, kemudian ia akan check email & telefon
9. Cemburu Berlebihan.
Jadi Kat sini nak minta pendapat korang macam mana nak hindar diri dari lelaki tersebut.'

mentaliti seorang 1st student (bakal 2nd year next sem) UMS berkenaan dengan KOLEJ KEDIAMAN:

2. orang yang ade kereta, motor, sewa motor wajib duduk luar (kadang2 org yg ade transport sendiri ni sbb mudah bergerak untuk buat aktiviti kat UMS ni, bukan senang lenang berjimba and ntah2 dorg ni lg aktif buat aktiviti daripada org xde transport sendiri, ingat petrol murah? ingat nak claim petrol kat UMS senang?)
3. orang sabah patut sewa luar and bagi peluang dekat orang semenanjung duduk Kolej Kediaman sebab kampung jauh and takde saudara mara and kawan dekat KK ni (yg org Tawau, Sipitang, Semporna, Lahad Datu yang jauh2 tu kau ingat ade saudara mara and kawan2 dekat KK ni, sedap mulut je ckp p tompang rumah2 dorg ni)

b'Anonymous Confession #1537
Di ums ni saya jumpa ramai kwn baru. Sy ada sorg kwn ni. Kami rapat dari sem 1 lagi. Dia berasal dr kpg. Sy berasal dr Bandar. Sy selesa berkwn dgn dia walaupun kami berbeza asal usul. Tapi, bila masuk saja sem 2, Dia berubah. Dia mula menunjukan sikap berlagak kaya. Dia suka pg tempat standard. Makan makanan mahal-mahal. Tidak mcm dulu, suka lepak di kedai mamak.
Sy mula rasa perubahan dia bila dia tahu kwn sy yg sorg bernama C berduit. Bagi sy, makan makanan standard, pg tempat mahal2 itu sudah biasa dgn suasana hidup sy di Bandar. Mungkin dia kejutan budaya. Mula lupa asal-usul. Seringkali mengadu tak cukup duit kat mak bapak di kpg. Kdg2 sy kesian kat mak bapak dia di kpg kerana percaya rintihan dia yg tak cukup duit utk makan. Sedangkan duit tu dia gunakan utk pergi ke tempat yg melebihi kemampuan dia. Sy sbg kwn tak mahu dia hanyut dgn dunia fantasi dia yang ingin hidup mcm anak org kaya. Sy kesian o dgn dia. Sy pikir budak kpg ni baik, sopan-santun, ingat asal-usul. Tapi gara2 dia, berubah terus persepsi sy. Mungkin tidak semua budak kpg begitu. Mungkin dia sorg sja.
Kpd kwn sy yg baca ini, tolonglah kamu sedar. Tanamkan niat belajar disini utk membantu keluarga kamu di kpg. Jgn kamu terus hanyut dgn dunia fantasi. Sy juga tidak begitu kaya utk membantu kamu menyelesaikan masalah kewangan kamu tu.'

b"Anonymous Confession #823
I'd like to share about this attitude of some people in UMS who didn't seem to know where they belong.
On Thursday before sem break,I was staying in SEIT foyer all by myself, finishing my assignment using laptop, sitting at a table of 4 chairs. Suddenly,3girls came out of Makmal Umum 1, (I bet they weren't SEIT's students since I never saw them before) without asking anything, shamelessly filled the 3 other empty chairs. I was ok with that until this one person asked me if the ums wifi in that school was strong so that she could continue downloading her unfinished-download movie/movies. I said I didn't know,but maybe (since I didn't use wifi on that time) and yet she complained unstoppably that the wifi network was so slow. While I was thinking deeply, they kept talking and I couldn't think very well. And again, I stayed calm until another one of them covered her mouth and spat to the wall, yet it was right in front of me,so the very 'kurang ajar'! Then they left without even say a word. 2 guys of their friend, were to leave but showed me a pencil, asked me if it was mine, said that they friends borrowed it,and I was like 'Huh? they didn't even ask/tell me', and they left with farewell.
I just kinda get a shock that some people didn't know how to respect others. What's bad is that those 3 girls were Sabahan (they even teach the 2 guys their Sabahan language) and worst, they wore tudung and I wonder how do u girls expect me to think of you with such attitude. I'm feeling bad, I don't want to think of anything bad anyway. So just please, have manners! You're not living in an isolated world. Imagine what would you feel when people do the same to you? I'm not confessing this on my benefits, just I don't want people to look bad in you. Please, everyone judge, so behave well. I am Sabahan Muslim as well and you left your dirty saliva in my school!"
b'Anonymous Confession #819\nI saw the es guy again at PPIB. I want to know him more and more:)'

b"Anonymous Confession #468\nfor those medic haters out there, i'm not going to tolerate how u guys always talk bad about us. sorry but my EQ is not high enough like any of my colleagues who choose to ignore whatever untrue and offensive story that u guys always post. i know v r given priority but do u know y v need this priority? seriously v really need it. i know u like to say u r also busy, but u just dunno how busy we r. U guys r complaining about how busy to finish a assignment. for us, our aim is not completing assignment, our aim is to finish today lecture after doing the given assignment. don't think medic course don't have assignment. for ur info, our printed lecture note have to be comprised of 8 slides per page, not 4 slides per page, if not our lecture note will be thick like hell. each lecture consists of average 50 slides and can even reach 100 slides in some lectures. our class starts from 8am and ends at 5pm from mon to fri during year1 and year2. besides that, u think we don't need to join curriculum? we need to find activity ourselves to get points due to time difference with u guys. some of us r even active enough to play sport every week don't have point. u guys complain when u r compulsory to join koko. we want to join but can't. u think v r rich to have car, u just dunno how precious the time is for us. we just can't stand doing nothing. and there is only 1 or 2 times the bus will pick us to spu and sometimes none. recently, got 1 moron who r jealous typed stupid thing on our confession page. look, the purpose we create that page for our own is because v r very stress. if u notice, most of the posts r complaining things. more like a complaining page and i doubt u won't be able to understand some of the posts. that's y v create another spu confession page. not because we like to isolate, is because there is no 1 else to understand our life. our school only has nurse and md. unlike other schools, there are dentistry, pharmacy, biomedic bla bla bla, they will understand us more. so much thing to tell but it would be endless if i continue to write, just want to tell those who like vinegar, pls behave urself."

b"Anonymous Confession #411\nAre you different?\nHave you ever had a strong desire to meet somebody who is totally different? I doubt I could ever find these kind of people in UMS. What I'm about to write will most likely makes me look like a selfish and arrogant person but if you are one of a kind, you'd understand. So here it goes. It\xe2\x80\x99s always the same shit every single day. Getting to know people is a hideous complex job. There\xe2\x80\x99s no more surprises in meeting new people because people are so predictable these days. You see people rush and even push others to get into the bus, you see a bunch of guys sitting at cafe talking and laughing pretty much about nothing, you see girls who overdressed themselves just for attention, you see your best friend finally found a partner and you start worrying about your future, you see people studying so hard in the library, you see people rushing from tutorial rooms to lecture halls, you see how nervous people are during presentations, you see how people compete to be the best students. Haven\xe2\x80\x99t we got enough of all these? I feel like I am standing right at the center of a huge circle not knowing which direction to take. It\xe2\x80\x99s like everybody knows where they\xe2\x80\x99re going to but me. It\xe2\x80\x99s like everybody is already half way achieving their dreams while I am still in the midst of discovering myself and what I want. I don\xe2\x80\x99t have priorities in life. I don\xe2\x80\x99t even know what should comes first and what should comes last. I guess I am just a lost girl. The idea of life which society has created just does not interest me. Why can\xe2\x80\x99t we have more than what we already have? Why is everything in life must be a damn competition? Why is it always about who wears the shortest skirt? Why do we place less importance towards those who could not speak English? Why does it only takes a minute for us to acknowledge and adore outer beauties but it takes ages to love inner beauties? Why can\xe2\x80\x99t we think out of the box and see life from a total different perspectives? Why are we trying so hard to be more like the world rather than being what we really want to be? Why is it gaining acceptance and recognition seems to be so important? Why are we trying so hard for nothing? So before you go out trying to change the world, ask yourself, \xe2\x80\x98what do I really want\xe2\x80\x99?"

b"Anonymous Confession #406
wild boar here again... #refer to confession 391,
dear mr cho, please do not blame our admin, u might think my post is lapsap, but it is actually a sincere confession from me. i am a 20 years old young man who is addicted to smoking. i am having a hard time putting it to stop. a female fren of mine actually told me that smoking guy scare most girls away.
i can make myself sound miserable like others, but i rather post something humorous but at the same time reflects my true situation. i choose to see it from a not-so-pathetic perspective than make myself sound like merely sad and miserable, because i know that my post wouldnt take the crave for nicotine away, but at least if it sounds funny, someone would smile reading it, perhaps she or he will have a better mood 2mr. my world is dark but if i gt a chance to brighten other's day, i would.
u might think this is a lapsap. not that you are wrong. you are right from ur perspective but please be more considerate and try to see from other's angle. dont blame admin he is doing a hard job to manage a page without any pay. he provide a platform for us to talk so please try and put urself in his place u might see things in diff way
sincerely,
wild boar, your potential fren"

b'Anonymous Confession #387
Hopefully what I want to confess here not going to cause any controversial issue whatsoever. Just a simple confession about reality I've been facing. Spend some time to read this and I hope you guys get something out of it.
Approximately 10 years ago, I had a miserable experience of being abused by someone related to my big family. I lived with in his family for quite sometimes, far away from my parents' house. He showed really nice characteristics in front of others but unfortunately that was really not his true colors.
When nights came, he brought me out and nahh.. His true colors were revealed. I who was always a na\xc3\xafve, spoilt 10-year old girl in my family, was kicked, punched, slapped, and beaten up by him, a navy army. He tortured me physically, mentally, and emotionally, secretly almost every night. Nobody else knew it. Except me myself, him and his little 4-year old son he brought along so as to enjoy the routine show. And of course, God, who always there watching it all from up above.
Up to the state where I had been threaten to be killed if anybody else found out.
Eventually scars and bruises were all over me too obviously to be seen by everybody in that house, there was a big fight between the couple because of that, the female begged me for not letting my family find it out, I was sent home, and case considered closed.
But the scars of my heart were too deep to heal that fast though no human eyes could see them.
There I learnt to keep every sadness just to myself, as I came to realize there is person who see what others had been through, see the tears, see the pain, but still don't feel the feel.
This terrible experience kept haunting me for years, and without realizing it, it totally changed my personalities over the years. I felt like a foreigner to myself; from a very extrovert to introvert, almost zero self-confidence yet still deteriorated, talkative to quiet, unsocial, and always kept very doubtful eyes at strangers and took a safe distance from them. And I had hard years, depressions over and over again since then, due to various causes and the changes kept taking over inside me.
Lastly, I realized that these were not temporary effects anymore. I lived with it for so long, it had become my habit, my personality and myself. Yes, I had changed from a very spoilt, common, simple daughter to hard-core independent and complicated girl. Fail communication. Only socialize with certain trustworthy-confirmed people. Do not mix with strangers. To say 'hi and some self-introduction' to new housemates give me numb and nervous that I've to say some prayer, 'selawat', and motivation to myself for times.
Sometimes I feel envy with people around me. They live simple lives, have simple minds and thus they see things in its simplest form.
"Why is she like that? She doesn't mix with others, only talks to the same people bla3.."
"Oh, because she is so arrogant, she thinks she is the best. She thinks she's beautiful, which apparently she's not. She thinks she doesn't deserve to get along with common people like us bla3.."
Seriously, people?
Just want to ask you guys honestly;
What do you feel when you're inside a toilet cubicle and people at the sinks see you enter it and start talking the nonsense about you while they know you hear it?
What do you feel you're praying at a prayer room and a group of course mates were chatting BESIDE you, talking about your "so called wild behaviors"?
What do you feel when people treating you real bad, rudely while your only mistake is just don't really good at starting conversation with them?
What do you feel when people you never know before come up to you, criticize you real bad, humiliating you in front of others with "kurang ajar.." and all when you actually don't even know what they are talking about? So much offensive comments..
While the people you don't even close can hurt you, how much pain they can cost you if you're close to them\xe2\x80\xa6
And what would you feel when your carefully-chosen trusted people betray your trust?
Put yourself in the shoes of abused victim. How do you see the world?
All these while, I was so afraid. And sometimes want to shout what had happened to me so that everybody got it and close their mouth shut.
However what has just happened to a person I know, open up my mind. She's the youngest in her family, now in her final year. So close to her final exam. Has been engaged and planned to get married early next year. And guess what? Her beloved father has just passed away due to heart cancer.
Different people have different problem. So when you think you're in the lowest state, know that there are people out there even worst. Don't let people know your problem, don't show problematic attitude. Not all people really understand and people they get other things else to bother and prospective problem to deal with. Put in mind that life is a test. If you just want merely happy things to happen, know that you can only find them all in paradise. So work hard for it. You're nobody to tell God you're not deserved to be tested. And for every trial He gives you, make sure you make benefits out of it; collect good deeds (pahala) for patience, change for better attitude, make God your Most Understanding and loyal partner, etc. Don't give a crap about peoples' opinions. Human beings are merely flawed creations, they're not necessarily correct.
There might be thousands things which make us unhappy, but God also give us millions more to be happy for.
So for all you guys out there, keep fighting and finding your light! ;)'

b'Anonymous Confession #295
Hi all, it's me again 6feet.
I would like to explain to those who have negative mind on me and I would like to thank to u guys for critic and comment.
First of all, dirty job people don't need fluent English to communicate. They just need a skillful mastery to complete their job. As for me, my English is sucks I admit it but at least I got band 4 in muet (not to show off or what) and got A since form 1. I typed broken English because is easy for me to express...or do u prefer a good poem to explain about my situation? I bet you need to search thru google about what i am talking about if i do so. I'm so sorry if I offended u.
As for my parents, yes, they are stingy fxxker. Opps maybe u guys are in different culture, I apologize about it. Basically this is how I communicate with my family members. We like to use harsh words to speak and expressing our emotion. The reason is my parents background. They dont get a degree like what I did, they are just standard 6 students. I guess this is influenced by environmental factor. This is me, I don't need to fake myself and form a good image <<< this will make myself even exhausting.
Ok, let's get back to the main topic. Today I want to share with u guys about "boss".
Most of u have a thought that boss is someone who goyang kaki and let the employee generating income to him or her.
Let say my salary is RM3,000, I have to work harder and lots of responsibility to get the paid and i complaining a lot about the workload. Can u imagine that a boss who got RM30,000 monthly how he works like? Yea u will say he just setup everything and employee just run according to the plan. No one knows he works harder than u do or I do. When a boss succeed, mostly of the friends or even relatives will "hati panas", \xe7\x9c\xbc\xe7\xba\xa2\xef\xbc\x8c\xe7\x9c\xbc\xe7\x83\xad... I'm sorry I have to write in Chinese because I don't know how to explain in English... It's something like jealous. I know this because this happened in my family. Uncle and my father... U see, abang Adik also become like that.
15years ago my family is penniless... After crisis. Since then my parents work harder than that.. I am sure u Guys Duno how hard they worked. My daddy can work 20 hours a day and no bathe for 3 days. Can u guys see the dedication?
In reality, society only sees the front part (appearance) and never see effort. That is why most of the employee can never success. If they understand and see the thru the effort, they would success in 1 day, I guarantee u!
I worked for my dad for almost 10years and I know about the society and the personality. They are so materialistic.
For example ( this actually happen) , when I dress normally, driving a saga to second hand car dealer, the salesmen are so arrogant... Looking down on me and never entertain me.
After an hour, I drove my daddy's car, the salesmen entertain me so well and so good in manner... Can u see the difference? About the car, u can guess by urself.
I write this post is to remind u guys, do not look down on any people that u met, he or she might be ur boss in future.
Sorry for the broken English and harsh words again. I hope u guys enjoy reading about my experience.
Thank you.
Sincerely from
6 feet'

b'Anonymous Confession #287
Hi everyone! I'm just graduated from Ums and I wonder how many of you in these kind of situations.
Most of the elders asking me
1." what do u want to work after ur graduation?"
2. "Comparing local uni and overseas uni by parents"
3. Looking down on dirty work as they prefer white collar
My own opinion:
1) I am actually always cover with lies when I've been being asking this question...sedang cari kerja yang sesuai la, mungkin continue master... Bla bla bla and so on. The truth is I love automaton, I found that I love to build automobile parts such as building engine. Combining every single parts of the engine.. the sounds of the engine is just like a cool rhythm to me.. i discovered this when I work with my father. My dad owned a few biz, and he asked me to work same standard as bangla.. At least Start from lowest level I guess

Damn... he is a lot smarter than me... No doubt...
***my parents are stingy fxxker

b"Anonymous Confession #272
I would like to share my feeling with you guys. I was having my dinner with my friends at Homes Restaurant in One Borneo. We ordered two fried rices and two asam laksa and I remembered that time is 7pm sharp. After twenty minutes they served the fried rice and I asked for my asam laksa after five minutes. They told me they are cooking it. Fine. Another 10 minutes, they gave me the same answer. Fine.
I kept on staring at the worker and she just having her snack so steady. I know she know I was staring at her because she scaned the whole restaurant but just dun wanna look at my table. My friend and I decided to leave once the other friend finished their fried rice. When we went to the counter and told the tauke we wanna cancel the order,you know what she say?? We're told we cannot cancel the order once we order the food. I was like what kind of rule that I never heard before? Why can't we cancel the order?
She said the asam laksa already finished when we ordered it. So they need sometime to cook it. Now only the asam laksa is ready for us. Why don't you just tell us early so that we can change our order? We used the fastest speed to finish it and leave the restaurant. I will never go to that restaurant again anymore."

b"Anonymous Confession #269\nCan I say something in regard to UMS list of lenglui's? What is this sudden craze on beautiful women? Frankly speaking, I am not biased or jealous type but did you know that these actions are beyond stupidity? Is there any beauty pageant held at UMS, that I am not aware of? Or this lists were to select top pretty women to represent Miss Malaysia contest? Why? May I know the reason? Everyone is beautiful in their own way and most importantly respect women and their privacy as well. Initially I thought it was just for fun and for sake of appreciating beauty but sooner or later I began to notice that there is a dramatic rise in counter posts and counter arguments from other parties stating that their school female students are much more prettier. b"Anonymous Confession #237\nWell, It's been quite a long time since me and my ex break up. Before we became couple, he treated me gently as if I'm special for him and he pledged that he will love me for who I am. I was totally fell for him by that. However, after coupled, he started treated me coldly especially after he got his car to use in KK. We had a fight and he said that he will never treat me as before so we ended broke up. By that time I thought it was my fault for our break up. However, later that I only knew that , before we broke up, he already started to date someone else with his precious little car. That girl was his course mate and she knew my presence and she herself had a boyfriend at home town at that time. But what pissed me off was when I with him, I never wanted him to spend so much on me as he was not a rich guy after all. We always date in places which did not need to spend money and only in cafe to save money. But the next day after we broke up, he officially hold her hand and always brought her to expensive restaurant and buy her expensive gift that I seldom requested from him. May be a not demanding girlfriend is not precious for guys or he never treated me seriously i perhaps. Everyone said that he is a play boy as he changed lots of girl friend before me. And I admit that I'm stupid that I didn't have a background check on him 1st before felling for him. I only knew all his ugly past after we broke up. May be I was lucky as at least I din't fall into the trap deeper and deeper. I did have my heart all broken for quite a long time. But from this ugly experience I learnt my lesson and no more Naif girl as I was new in University. But everything has passed and I have graduated, I'm happy now and lead a better life. I would like to confess here so that other girls will be aware of this kind of guy. So girls, dun simply fell for guys for their gentleness and sweet talk but you should observe and get to know him better 1st before felling for guys. There are play boys even in University so becareful. And Yes, I still dislike him and feel that even the air that I breath in in the same space with him r dirty and I believe he will get his Karma 1 day."

b"Anonymous Confession #236
I would like to confess my feelings towards someone i love simply because I realize there isn't much time left in my uni-life. Soon, she'll leave my life,so this is my last chance to speaks my mind out to her. Its a bit lengthy, sorry about that.
Dear girl who I love,
I confessed my feeling to you when i met you last time, all i said are not lies and it comes from my heart.
Well, you seems didn't even bother about it, I should know about it. Maybe i am your biggest mistake in your life. For you,i am just a living mistake, a bad memory which you'll try to forget about the existence of it. Maybe I should follow you to do so as well, right?
Maybe that is the best outcome for both of us, if there is any 'us' left. Kinda sad isn't it?
Why can't i excel even in to be together with the one i love?
You once said people will not marry to someone who they love the most but they will marry someone who suits them the most.
How sad this statement is, yet it is happening to me right now.
But, how can i do this to another girl?
How can i accept her to walk into my heart when my heart is fully occupied by you?
Throughout my uni life, i never really pay so much effort on something except for you.
When I struggle for you, destiny plays its evil tricks on us.
Why the life wants to fail me in something that i had struggle so hard? How can I forget all the good memories?
Why when both of us together it becomes the biggest mistake in the world?
Why can't i just become the one who suits you, the one you wants?
Why can't we just be together? Why the timing always incorrect?
Why there is always a path between you and me that i cannot cross?
Why everyone around me can get their happiness, to be with people they like except me?
Why the society just won't let us to be together?
What's left for me is the vast starry night that quietly accompany me alone with nothing but my tears and our past memories.
No matter how much i miss you, no matter how much i need you, you wont be around with me anymore. How i wish i could just stay here to be with you, even cant become a professional, it doesn't matter. As long as i am with you, we can lead a simple life, do some small business, go to church during Sunday, enjoy our life with loves come from both of us and God.
Life is just about to be with the one you love and enjoy it, isn't it?
Or I can become a tutor or teacher, enjoy our simple life with love and joy. Why the reality is always so cruel, has no mercy to people? I just want to spend my life with the one i love, be it rich or poor, sick or healthy,all i want is just to be with you.
How much money we owned cannot compare to how much happiness or how much love we have in our life.
You came into my heart and filled it with our memories of joy and pain and your lovely smile.
When you leave my life,your silhouette fills in my minds, eventually it became the deepest cut in my hearts.
I always dream of you when I am asleep, they say its because the person miss you, is it that you miss me? Because I do, I always do miss you a lot.
The smile of you just like the spring breeze can't wipe out from my mind no matter how hard i tried.
I just can't admit that there are other girls who are better than you, you are simply the best for me.
I know this may not be the true love for most of the people, more to deformed and sicked type of love, they would say, but this is how my way to love someone.
The truth is I will never forget you and all our memories. You will always live in my heart whether we are together or not.
Love is about appreciation, you don't pick a flower if you love it, you will let it be. You wouldn't want it to wilted because of your love. It's painful to apply it in real life, but i believe i can get through this.
Sincerely and truthfully,
A boy who always keep his heart for you
(PS: sorry for any grammatical error or any misuse words)"

b'Anonymous Confession #210
Dear other "anonymous"-es with stalker-y messages,
Seriously dudes/dudettes? Rather than being stalker-y, just tell her/him what you think about them at that time. Moments, they come and go all the time. Besides, it's not like the world is going to end if they feel bad about what you tell them (maybe if you "criticized" them awfully). If you really-really-really as in forever and ever-ever (Oh, really?) "love" them, why not court them? Courting is not wrong, if done correctly~
Anyways, lek bah. It's university -- we must sometimes go and meet with the most "fierce" lecturer, knowing that he/she might fail us. But, we always know it is not the end of the world, and there's always next semester~ Cheerio~! hehe~ (y)
Keywords: #NOT-the-end-of-the-world, #courting-is-good, #study-comes-first, #enjoying-life-comes-before-study, #we-are-awesome'

b"Anonymous Confessions #201\nTo be honest it's more of a rant than confession. So, remember you are warned. So, recently I am blamed for not willing to share my points and idea during presentation. Firstly, the group leader divided the work to us. And all of us have our own parts. So I and one of my 'groupmate' (not sure if that term exist) were given the same part. I did mine and handed it in to the leader so he can combine. He later came to me and said that I'd have to share my work with 'that person' who shared the same subtopic as me. Automatically, I refused as it was mine and I worked hard on it. There will still like 7 hours left for the presentation, so I told him that 'the person' can come up with something. But, no. That person didn't. Instead, that person came and asked for my work. And I refused. I told that person no straight to the face. And somehow that person still ended up presenting a few of mine. And I didn't say anything although it bothered me. Now that person is badmouthing me to everyone and in Facebook. I'm not sorry about what I did. I'm not saying that I'm 100% perfect but at least I did the work that is needed to be done. I have done nothing wrong and I'm not guilty. That person was logged in Facebook that whole day. How long would it have taken during that time to finish the task that was given. And I've had fucking enough because I know everyone's on her side. They say I'm selfish and a horrible person. I don't care if they hate me. I didn't come here to make friends, but just to get a degree. I don't know how I ended up being the wrong person in this. Even you don't do your job, you can't expect everyone to help you. It's that person's responsibility. Why on earth is it my fault? Why are people so mean? Now I know what my course mates think of me. Thank you so much. I can't wait to finish another 3 semester and never ever see your faces again. I don't wait to create havoc or start an argument with her as I have to still work together with her for a few more assignments. Maybe this seems an act of coward since I am ranting here instead of confronting her. And I can't tell my friends because they won't understand. I just needed to tell someone. So, thanks for reading."
b'Anonymous Confession #200\nCONFESSIONS WITH GRAMMAR ERRORS. Oh My English!'

How did that happen, i just trained and forced myself to like girls as that is the law of life by u know watching straight porn. So,i tought i would feel bettr as now i like both guys and girls. How wrong i was, i cant be gay now as my brain knows its gross n wrong from the begining ( still watch gay videos, might be because of addiction or lust and feel so guilty and depressed after that. Watched straight porn too but not guilty after that one. But liking both of them confuses me like hell as i hve no own identity. Im not in gay category or straight. So,i just want normal life and find a good girl to settle down.
But problem is i am obsessed with a guy friend ( i dunno what to call it, love or what) but i just care a lot about him but im not physically attracted to him as . After my obvious obsession, stalking and problems i created for him, we fight a lot and now he just talks if i talk to him. But the truth, he never cared. And all this while,for years i was blaming myself that i must be gay coz i care and love my best friend. How fucking confusing, in fact even if im gay, doesnt mean i wan to do gross stuff to my own friend. For a bisexual friendship, love and lust is so confusing that the stress from it just ruins your life. Even now im thinking about my friend. So, i think about him coz im gay? or i think about him coz im obsessed? or im just a good friend who cared to much for a friend who dont deserve it.
Freaking confusing life but have to face it anyway. Want to meet girls and talk but will they accept a bisexual? I love to be straight at times and other times my heart becomes gay ( not actually doing any gross gay things,just watch gay porn maybe), will this be okay for a girl?'

b'Anonymous Confession #160
So,
This is it. Heart broken. Tears drop everywhere.
This is it. Its too late, too late to apologize.
This is it. Regrets, nothing could be done anymore.
This is it. Letting go, breaking apart, saying goodbye.
This is it. The end. The end of our story.
To everyone out there, hold on tight to your loved one. Love her, surprise her, be with her, all the time. Trust me, Regrets and letting go is just too hard to bear. Too hard even for the most strong hearted one.'

b"Anonymous Confession #159\nPast few days I can feel distance between me & my friends. This all started when I made a decision that they did not agree on. I know the decision I made is 100% right & I will never regret the decision I made.I even told them the reason for the decision I made but unfortunately they did not understand & they felt like I put them in trouble. But they fail to realize I will never put my friends in trouble. I am not selfish. Since then they always find reason to blame me on that (indirectly) & they start to avoid me. They practically ignore my presence and only talk among themselves & only talk to me if there is a need. They sort of ganging up against me. I want to confront them on this but surely they will deny the fact they are avoiding me. Each people are entitled to their opinion. As a friend, they should understand that & respect it. Its not always I have to follow on the decision they made. I have my opinion too. (they aspect me to agree on their decision all the time but they won't admit). Its so sad to know that people whom you consider as your close friends can do this to you. Sometimes I wonder maybe they are not actually my friends. I also think that at times they don't deserve my friendship but then again I really consider them as my close friends & its impossible for me to avoid them. Whatever it is I am ready to apologize to them even though its not my fault because my friendship is more important than my ego. But the question is will they able to do the same ???? Its really hurting me badly inside :("

b'Anonymous Confession #142
A letter for my future boyfriend
Hey, guy. I still don\xe2\x80\x99t know what your name is. Hence, during the first meet, I wish you can introduce yourself more in detail, so I can know more about you.
The guy, I don\xe2\x80\x99t know whether you now are single or falling in love with a girl. Well, if you are single now, please take care yourself. I hope you eat health, play well, sleep fine and pass your every single exam as well. I don\xe2\x80\x99t hope to know you are a guy of gangster, with smoking habit and bad attitude as well. It will make me suspect my self-ability in looking for my soul-mate. However, if you are in a relationship now, please remember to love and care her more. She will happy and loved. If unfortunately you are just lose or break in love, don\xe2\x80\x99t be so sad, but try your best to recover from your sad instead because, we will meet up soon.
I\xe2\x80\x99m just a very common girl, not much different compared with other female, a little bit round-shape in looking. My attitude not bad, except sometimes will be a bit crazy with friends. I like all the romantic activities you plan to do with me, lying on the field\xe2\x80\x99s ground of starry sky to plan for our great future, holding hands together when walk on the beach, running in the rain with you, standing under an umbrella with you, sharing an earphone with you and travel with you as well\xe2\x80\xa6\xe2\x80\xa6\xe2\x80\xa6 and so much more. Well, let us do for it in the future instead of letting me listing down it alone here. I\xe2\x80\x99m very independent and persistent as well. But, that is what people know about me, nobody know sometimes I crying during shower time. Tear drop uncontrolled when I lying on the bed. But, I still keep showing smiling face on the next morning to pretend my weakness. If there is nobody understand you, better don\xe2\x80\x99t drop your tear in front of them, and turn back before your tear drop. We will meet up soon. I\xe2\x80\x99m not same as other girl who is gentle and soft, but I do hate violent. Sometimes when I\xe2\x80\x99m in bad mood, I will scold you, but that is not my intention, I just treat you as a target for me to complain and release my stress, as you have to understand I will only do it for the people I care in my life. So, please don\xe2\x80\x99t blame me and leave me alone on that time, but give me a big hug, sweeping over my tear and motivate me instead, I will be fine soon. I like to cook, if I can meet you early, I will learn to cook your favorite food, if cannot, I will learn it slowly and steadily after we meet up, we have whole lifetime to go through together.
Sometimes I feel lonely as almost all my friends around me are in relationship, I saw them holding-hands together while walking, sharing their foods when eating, watching for movie together with couple-shirt. I start to feel desperate, and thinking for the time to meet up with you. Recently, some of my friends falling in love one after one, I become more desperate. Last night, my housemates also discuss about this topic, I start to worry, and you not yet appear in my life, I still in waiting. But I do understand I should not be too worries and desperate, because we will meet up soon, and what I need to do right now is counting down the time for us to meet up.
If you cannot give all of your love to me, please do treat and care me more, let me love you more instead. The wonderful things in the world are love and food, so I will never stingy in order to share and enjoy my love and food with you.
For you, I don\xe2\x80\x99t have must criteria. You only need to be a common person like me, no need to have very handsome look, I will feel lost in the sense of security. Actually, I \xe2\x80\x98m not really care in your appearance as long as I have feeling to you. I just hope you are good in emotion-management, maturity, and the most important is self-motivation (ambition). I don\xe2\x80\x99t expect you have 6 packs like fighter, but at least taller and bigger in body size than me, so I can feel more slim and small when stand beside you, with more sense of security as well, but better don\xe2\x80\x99t have an obvious tummy. You must have healthy lifestyle, without smoking. I hope you like read, exercise as well as know about what is happens around. So, we can treat each other like friend share and discuss with fine conversation. I hope you are from healthy and normal family, you received fine love and care before you meet up with me, so we know how to foster and educate our next generation. If I only can meet you after graduate, I hope that time you have a firm job with satisfies salary paid, having extra saving for our future, able to spend money to sent your parents for vacation as well. I don\xe2\x80\x99t expect you are from rich family, we can try to be rich by our own. I hope you treat my family as your family as well as how to treat your family also, I will do the same as you, because we will become family also in the future.
Hey, guy. This few days I quite stress and sometimes suffer insomnia too as mid-term come, assignment not yet finish, never ended lab report, presentation awaiting for, activities and program hanging on and stress in study. Then how are you going on over there? I hope you are fine\xe2\x80\xa6 Remember, I\xe2\x80\x99m counting down the moment to meet up with you\xe2\x80\xa6
Your sincerely,
Future girlfriend'

b"Anonymous Confession #140
It's 3:30 midnight now, and I would like to share about things according to my opinion. Well, I hope it went well and I do pretty sure what would readers respond.
I am a second year student from SBE and I would like to discuss on the matter regarding this confession page. Now, this page had not violated any norms or regulations in our fancy virtual world. I do like to read-up page like this, especially UMS Confession page when boredom strikes. Nevertheless, I felt as if I'm at the state of euphoria knowing the existence of this page. (At a moment, you did ponder yourself on why this guy came upon and tell us on how happy he is for the existence of this page.) The reason simply because we are not laid-back compared to other Universities. (You know, at least we have this platform to discuss things in regarding of our daily problems)
Now, after a month of observation on this confession page. Confession that has been made had turn-up 100 confessions last week (Bravo). But, there is this particular issue that keeps bugging me in my mind which is, the lack of engagement by the administrator and the poor proficiency of English possess by the administrator. Before you guys throw me with all your hatred, please let me clarify myself.
I don't see the dire need of a confessor to possess a good English proficiency while submitting his/her confessions. BUT, I do see the hell of the dire need in an administrator to really have a good English proficiency in giving advices, thoughts, opinions, credits, compliments et cetera. The reason why because I address this issue is because UMS confession page is a platform for us to share our conundrums, feelings, stories and somehow is a share of knowledge as well. When I see administrator used abbreviation (especially) in every words he is trying to deliver, it really really turns me down at once.
The reason why things are to be conduct in English should be flawless especially when we are expressing our feelings, is because the power of words. The power of words in English that really startled one's mind. From a comparative view, confessions page from other virtual society, they really portray everything in a well-manner. Try to search NUS confession page where confessors and administrators there really make use of English words. I am aware I compared UMS confession page to a prestigious National University of Singapore confession page, but I really do hope that we stand on-par with NUS when it comes into English.
So, I do beg for the change of the administrator to really really help and guide us in a proper way and an above average manner of English while subjecting your comments. And I do apologize if I have offended anyone here, especially administrators. And also, it is matric number (not metric, as you ask us to fill in our matric number before we can confess). Thank you."

To my dear gay and lesbian friends out there

Now what I cannot stand is the "oh,what the hell am I?" people

my point is,u wanna be gay or a lesbian,be my guest.....but don't use others as a test-drive tool....it hurts like hell....and yes,I am one of the dumped ones....I know those who are reading this will have a great laugh....I just wish I could laugh too'

b'Anonymous Confession #110
SEBELUM MAJLIS KONVOKESYEN
1.0 CARA PEMBAYARAN YURAN KONVOKESYEN
Pembayaran yuran Konvokesyen boleh dibuat melalui:-
a) Bayaran secara perbankan internet Financial Process Exchange (FPX) ke akaun UMS melalui pautan konvo.ums.edu.my/myhutang;
b) Bayaran secara online ke akaun UMS melalui pautan www.maybank2u.com.my dan www.cimbcliks.com.my;
c) Bayaran secara manual di kaunter Jabatan Bendahari Aras 3 Blok Utara Bangunan Canselori pada bila- bila masa sebelum 18 November 2013;
d) Bayaran secara manual di Dewan Kuliah Pusat Ke-2 UMS pada 18-22 November 2013 semasa sesi pengambilan jubah. Kaunter bayaran akan dibuka pada:- Sesi 1: 8.30 Pagi Hingga 12.30 Tengahari dan Sesi 2: 2.00 Petang Hingga 4.00 Petang;
e) Pembayaran melalui Automatic Teller Machine (ATM) dan Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) tidak dibenarkan kerana bayaran jenis ini sukar untuk dikenalpasti maklumat pembayaranya.
Pembayaran secara FPX SANGAT DIGALAKKAN kerana :-
i. Urusniaga dapat dilakukan dalam keadaan selesa;
ii. Urusniaga boleh dilakukan pada bila-bila masa;
iii. Tidak perlu beratur di kaunter bank/ Jabatan Bendahari;
iv. Maklumat pembayaran melalui kaedah ini akan dikemaskini secara automatik dalam sistem;
v. Menjimatkan masa;
vi. Cepat dan selamat.
2.0 PERTANYAAN
Jabatan Bendahari boleh dihubungi melalui butiran di bawah untuk sebarang pertanyaan.
No Telefon: 088-320000 sambungan 1019/1116/1432/1060
No Faks: 088-320235
Email: bkpums@gmail.com
2.0 CARA PEMINJAMAN JUBAH AKADEMIK
a) Pelajar yang telah membuat pembayaran ke dalam akaun UMS, sila serahkan salinan slip bank ke kaunter pengambilan jubah sebagai bukti pembayaran telah dijelaskan.
b) Bagi pelajar yang belum membuat pembayaran, sila berbuat demikian di Kaunter Bendahari dan kemukan resit rasmi ke kaunter pengambilan jubah.
c) Sila serahkan tiket jubah di Kaunter Serahan Jubah
d) Para graduan akan dipinjamkan pakaian akademik yang terdiri daripada sehelai jubah,sehelai \xe2\x80\x98hood\xe2\x80\x99 mengikut sekolah dan satu \xe2\x80\x98mortar board\xe2\x80\x99 (Rujuk di lampiran).
e) Graduan adalah bertanggungjawab memastikan
i. Pakaian akademik yang diterima berada dalam keadaan baik dan sempurna; dan
ii. \xe2\x80\x98hood\xe2\x80\x99 program pengajian adalah betul iaitu mengikut sekolah
f) Graduan tidak dibenarkan mengubahsuai mana-mana bahagian pakaian akademik yang dipinjam.
g) Urusan peminjaman pakaian akademik adalah pada tarikh, masa dan tempat seperti berikut:
Tarikh : 18 hingga 22 November 2013 (8.30 pagi \xe2\x80\x93 5.00 petang)
Tempat: Dewan Kuliah Pusat ke-2 (Berhampiran Bangunan Baru BPA)
Tarikh : 23, 24 & 25 November 2013 (8.30 Pagi \xe2\x80\x93 5.00 Petang)
Tempat: Bilik Sijil Muzik, Aras Bawah, Dewan Canselor
\xc2\xb7 Tertakluk kepada perubahan dari masa ke semasa
3.0 BORANG PENGESANAN GRADUAN "TRACER STUDY"
Semua graduan WAJIB melengkapkan maklumat Kajian Pengesanan Graduat IPTA yang boleh dicapai melalui laman web UMS. Sila isi borang soal selidik dengan lengkap dan hantar semula borang secara \xe2\x80\x98online\xe2\x80\x99 kepada pihak UMS. Tuan/Puan adalah dikehendaki membawa cetakan slip pengesahan kajian yang telah dilengkapi semasa mengambil jubah.

4.0 PAKEJ KONVOKESYEN
Setelah selesai semua perkara di atas, pastikan beg yang diterima oleh graduan lengkap berisi:
a) Satu Jubah Konvokesyen.
b) Satu Hood (mengikut program kecuali program Diploma SPU)
c) Satu Mortar Board (Kecuali program Diploma SPU).
d) Satu Kad Jemputan (mengikut sidang).
e) Satu Pelekat Kereta.
Nota: Sila pastikan bakal graduan mendapat pakej yang lengkap seperti di atas

5.0 CARTA ALIR DAN PROSES KERJA PENGAMBILAN JUBAH

Sila rujuk maklumat berikut bagi tujuan proses sebelum pengambilan jubah akademik
(Maklumat sedang dikemaskini)
.::PENGUMUMAN::.
1. Yuran konvokesyen WAJIB DIBAYAR sebelum mengambil jubah.
2. Sila rujuk SEBELUM MAJLIS untuk cara pembayaran yuran.
3. Sila bawa TIKET AMBIL JUBAH semasa mengambil jubah. Tiket ambil jubah boleh dicetak di dalam sistem MyHutang.
4. Tunggakan yuran WAJIB DIBAYAR sebelum mengambil transkrip dan skrol.
5. Diingatkan kepada semua bakal graduan agar mengemaskini maklumat anda di Tracer Study bermula 25 Oktober 2013
6.MAKLUMAN PENTING !!!!!
KAJIAN PENGESANAN GRADUAN(TRACER STUDY) Makluman kepada para graduan konvokesyen ke -15,Sistem Tracer Study akan dibuka bermula pada 25 Oktober 2013. Mohon agar para graduan mengemaskini data dalam sistem tersebut sebelum membuat pengambilan jubah.Sila cetak slip pengesahan Tracer Study dan dibawa semasa pengambilan jubah.Kegagalan membawa slip pengesahan akan menyulitkan proses pengambilan jubah graduan
KONVO.UMS.EDU.MY
http://konvo.ums.edu.my/myhutang'

b'Anonymous Confession #68
Anonymous Confession #68
This is a confession to a mistake I made when I was still a first year student.
I was attending night class, and took the last bus back to IP. It was really pack so as usual all those standing squeezed tightly into whatever space we can find and stand for the whole journey. It was not a short journey, and so it was tiring. Fortunately, my friend was just in front of me so we talked all the way.
Halfway back to IP, I realize that my umbrella was hitting something. I had a habit of taking to class an umbrella just in case it rained. As far as standing, I place my umbrella between my arm and armpit so I no need to place it on the floor and no place to hang inside bus also. Thus the hitting.
Because of the tight spot I was in, I could not fully turn my body to see what was it my umbrella hit. I can just turn my head a little and peak at what was behind me. To my surprise, it was a Chinese girl, wearing formal, and kinda cute. But her expression was not right. To my amazement what my umbrella hit was her boobs. No wonder she was struggling to cover that part.
What happens next? I panicked. I was never the type of guy to offend a girl in any way, especially touching sensitive parts!!! I tried to place my umbrella on the ground, but the bus was moving so fast moving around seems worse, because it keeps poking her back. Imagine standing in a moving bus with a bag behind you, a laptop bag hanging on your right shoulder and your damn umbrella making you a sexual offender.
In lights of happenings, I gave up and just tried my best to push forward so my umbrella did not hit her. I can swear I saw her blush LOL. Not long after that we finally reached IP. I wanted to turn around and apologize, but for some reason I could not find the courage to do so. I must have been afraid to face her, but I also lost my only chance to see her full face, and to correct myself whether she was really cute or it was my imagination.
In the end, I did not apologize, I did not get to see her face, but I did try to peek from far as I was walking down the hill towards my house unit. Until this day I still dunno who that poor girl was. If given the chance, I will surely apologize and grab that chance to look at her.
Here I am, apologizing for my actions and causing discomfort to the girl. If by some chance you are seeing this, know that I am deeply sorry for what happened on the bus and regretful that I never apologized formally to you. Please accept my apologies. :)'

b'Anonymous Confession #54
I know her at UMS. We have been together for almost 3 years.
But we broke up 1 month ago. I'm the one who proposed the break up. I'm too stress due to my work and all the quarrel with her. When we just break up, I dream of her every night. I miss her but don't dare to tell her. By that time, she thought that I'm good living without her because my friend always tagged me outing, but she don't know I try to hideaway.
Now, I'm regret. It's all my fault. I was never so wrong before. I had hurt her very very deep. After a month, I just realized that I can't live without her. She is the reason why I smile and laugh everyday. I tried to contact her back and chase her back, but she told me she already put down me. I ask whether we still have chance, she told me now no chance, future no chance, forever no chance.
I'm so sad. The agony feeling is running wild in me everyday. She don't pick up or direct hang up my call, she ignore my text message and FB message. Now, I'm weeping like a kid everyday. I mean like everyday. I can't control my tears dropping out. I even cried at public place, inside car, workplace. Cried like a loser.
I felt that I'm so useless. Why I don't appreciate her when I could and regret after that? I had lost my direction. I don't know what to do anymore.
I wish she can give me one last chance to compromise her, cherish her, and make her happy. But now it seems too late right? It's all too late. The broken heart can't be mend anymore even though we have so much of great memory. I'm just a loser who regret only when it's too late. I'm just a loser who don't know appreciate until it's too late. :((
For guys, break up is the worst choice to solve relationship problem, ask yourself clearly do you still love her or not when "break up" come across your mind. If there's problem, just sit down and talk, settle nicely. Please don't act impulsively. You may come regret at the end and cry like a loser like me. Please appreciate what you have.
For girls, I know normally girl is more emotional. Calm yourself first when your bf do mistake. Don't simply throw all tantrum to him and expect him to apologize again and again. Please appreciate what you have.
Lastly, I don't know how long my situation will persist. I can feel that my feeling toward her now are so strong and I won't give up so easily. I felt very sorry for her. It's all my fault. But what had been done could not be undone. I hope she will happy and bliss. :')
#SSS pathetic guy to SKTM pretty girl'

b"Anonymous Confession #53
I am a first year student.I would like to thank everyone who has been there to help me out when I pass out during last semester.I was hospitalised for two weeks due to critical condition of my health.When I regained my consciousness back after three days being at ICU,a lot of UMS friends and lecturers pay their visit.The most touching part is a lot of people stay awake whole day and night at hospital to inform my parents if I happened to regain my consciousness and they even take turns to take care of me.i would like to pin point out about my beloved course mate and my best friend whom is a Muslim girl has been there all day and night crying and praying to Allah for my speedy recovery.When I opened my eyes,she was there giving one of sweet smile. At that moment,I never knew what had happened.Not just her, but all of my course mates were there and constantly messaging and asking for updates of how I have been doing.To be frank,i was overwhelmed by their warmth and their care. For a moment,I was happy to be hospitalised as I learnt who were my real friends.Some of my friends(course mates) also helped me to do my OWN assignment and not forgetting my lecturers who have changed the marking rubrics as finals is just around the corner.I thought I am just going to fail but to my surprise,I scored quite heavy carry marks which I am sure I don't really deserve.
Apart from that,I would like to thank all of my friends at UMS who have helped my parents with free transportation service to and fro from UMS-hospital-hotel.Plus,some seniors helped my parents to book free air ticket for my parents to come to Sabah. You guys are awesome !
**I have always been a quiet person who normally does not mingle around with people. When my family members told me all this,i hardly could believe my ears.No matter how many times i thank them,its just not enough.Again i would like to say my heartiest sincere thanks to all of my buddies(everyone).I have always doubted myself about how am I going to adapt in a faraway place without my family but thanks to all of you,I fit in as a fiddle after this incident.Love you all"

b"Anonymous Confession #43
A lot of people complained about how medical student have so many cars. Yes, we admit that most of us have cars.However, it is more of a necessity rather than just convenient.
Those starting clinical year would know how having a car would save us tons of time.But it isn't just saving time. A lot more experience are gained after office hours. Specialists, lecturers usually aren't free during office hours, so we have to make time for them, sometimes sacrificing our weekends to be in hospital. A lot of the stuff we learned comes during the time outside the office hour. I still remember staying at hospital till midnight just for a chance to deliver a baby, from getting her to the delivery room, to cutting the umbilical cord, to washing the instruments. The school won't provide transportation for situation like those, and it is agreed that the medical students learn a lot more like this than just sitting around in a lecture hall hearing lectures.
Still, the problems with parking and all is still there. We do sincerely apologise about that. But the gain that we get, the knowledge we acquired, may someday save someone lives, or probably those close to you. A car is just a small investment in long-term knowledge.
Sincerely,
A-lifetime-student in the field of medicine"

b'Anonymous Confession #34
I must admit to my fellow course mates, you are just OH MY GOD. Every time you guys enter the lecture hall, you would just leave the door to close on its own instead of closing it slowly by yourself. And then, a loud BANG especially from the Podium B door that can even be heard from my friends inside Podium A and C for 14 weeks! I have no idea you are either lacking common sense or whatever it is going on in your mind at that time.
There's more I'd like to confess in general of recent KAL students' problems such as the flies in the cafeteria and 'big-scary-looking-dog-body' but nah. They tend to complain and whine on almost everything that seems to just only happened to them. Over this past year, I've seen people instead of reporting to the relevant authorities directly on the issue they are facing, they would just post it on the KAL FB group as though it is a google translate page that helps to solve their problems. I pity the JAKMAS/MPP fellows responding to their petty complaints although I do understand some issues require them, not most of the nonsenses.
I love this whenever it happens. KAL always faces water crisis almost every month and whenever there is no water for all of us to shower, 3-4 of our pampered keyboard warriors will start showing up in the FB group whining the same thing time and time again - "no water for 1 day ad! jakmas sedang tidur ka!?". So pathetic yet it happens every single time. Oh by the way for non-KAL people's knowledge, there are multiple big water tank for everyone here to collect water/shower/etc. 10-20 metres away from our respective hostels, but they chose to 'ragepost' instead. The best joke I read was that they blamed UMS for the frequent water issues instead of the Labuan water supplier company. /facepalm
tl;dr KAL is always filled with lots of dramas and bad jokes. Ask your friends about it!
Anyway, good luck to all UMS-ians for your final exam! May lady luck be with you!
#Labuan campus'

b'Anonymous Confession #14
[Why not Sabahan change?]
Today, I went to KK food fest. A rainy day.
Thanks god! Finally the project around the Post Office completed!
I appreciate much with this new corridor with roof.
However, the corridor become a place for PILAK or you call it PTI or PATI (Pendatang asing tanpa izin) to "WORK" as beggar. There is signboard "Dilarang menjajal", "Dilarang meletak motosikal", "Stick no bills"...But no "No beggars" ...
I saw a women with a girl, just lying on the floor and wait for your money.
Did i donate? Hell no. My mom raise me and my 2 siblings with own hands alone!
Why can't they find a job? I saw the PTI kids and adults work as cleaner and waiter everywhere in KK.
#Yes, current government give us sth good (infrastructure);
In return, we have to tolerate them about importing PTI stealthy or allow PTI to stay illegally under Malaysian laws.
Remind me of the Hernan Reyes in Fast Five:"If you dominate the people by force, they will eventually fight back, because they have nothing to lose. And that's the key: I go into the favelas and give them something to lose - electricity, running water, schoolrooms for their kids. And for that taste of a better life...I own them."
That's the trick of current government.
On the way back from Suria Sabah.
I saw an incident. At the same corridor, beside the road...
2 kids were holding a paper cup and asking money from the driver.
First luxury car with Sabah State logo (i presume state officer) ignored them, so they haunted the second car. Then, the traffic lights turns green.
They tried to grab the side mirror and then caused the traffic jam. Somehow, they intended to force the driver to give them some money BY THREATENING THEIR LIFE.
Well, the HK tourists who witness this incident chit chat (front of us) among themselves. Guess what they chit chat? Sure not about gorgeous of our minister of tourism la. I bet, they're going tell a tale after back to country.
Luckily, a kadazan uncle pedestrian shouted at boys and stopped them.
They let go the car, seek for next victim.
They threaten their life for money now.
After they grew up, they will risk their life for money.
#They have nothing to lose.
At the bus stop, I met 2 pilak girls.
They're holding cups and beg from every tourist in the bus stop.
Remind me of a Korea lenglui tourist I have met months ago.
She donated RM50 to a pilak girl, she was trying to ease her poverty. *BIG WAH!*
And these girls going to use the same survival trick to live their life day after day.
#They are not going to learn a skill, they have an easy way.
This kind of things, happen everyday around us in KK.
Why HIGHLIGHT now ? It's a cue for you to think.
Every year budget comes from Federal. (Facts and you can't stop)
Every year DBKK can use the budget to do something. (Facts and you can't stop)
Every year pilak grow up, fucked (maybe no TV) and here comes the new pilak babIES. (Facts and you can stop).
#To change or not change, that is the question.'

I'm final year student from SKTM.
I have something confess to those do-not-concern-me-fella.
Here's the issue.
Some of the fella don't have the seat, and reluctant to move backward but occupy the front. Then, the bus driver assumes the bus is full. Sometimes, bus problem is not totally a bus driver problem, it maybe not peak hour problem, it certainly not air freshness problem in the bus (due too a lot foul body odors).
I assume is the attitude problem. And why the hell you pay TUT bus/ City bus and you do as what they demand (squeezing yourself like a sardine in the can) but you can't do it in the free shutter bus to benefit others.
*FACE PALM*
Please, please, please. Have you ditched by UMS shutter bus before due this reason. Just move backward and you no need to be exactly like a sardine, make yourself comfortable but letting others to have a chance ok? I'm not going to criticize about the "competition to get into bus", as many of us presume that is a norm and necessary survival capability in ourselves. But why you fight for a place at the front? This make you getting home faster? Can compensate your disappointment? Some even ridiculous, standing at the door, for what?
*FACE PALM X 2 *
Hey, come on, the final goal is to reach destination.
If you wanna chit chat with you friend, tahan for a while, you can have all your time after get down from bus and have a better environment to chat. Please lah, whenever you stand in the bus, move backward a bit, just a short distance. If you live in IP, USIA, KF you can adjust yourself to have more comfortable condition/space after bus passed thro' the UMS gate.
You might not know that your action is gonna affect someone's life but now you know. Do it and you will have a better day by receiving anonymous' gratitude from deep of the heart.
TQVM.
#I merely left a sem but think of those who still have to stay in UMS for few sems. A good changes can benefit everyone.
#KK CAMPUS'
b'Anonymous confession #7\n"To all the UMS girls,\nNever look back to the guy who made you cried. You will never know there is someone better waiting for you in the future :) "'

b'Anonymous confession #6\nMy gf and I have been together for 3 years. All this while, we were very happy together until i read her txt msg in her phn. I knw its not right, but i have been suspecting something fishy that she is doing behind me. I found plenty of msgs between her and a guy. So I called up this guy and asked him to meet up the next day. To my suprise, when i reached the canteen, I saw my gf and a grp of friends waiting for me with balloons and cake! Then, i realized it was all a prank!!! GOD, I LOVE MY GF! This confession is for you BABY PEI YI !'

b'I believe UMS Confessions is a medium for all of u to write your own LOVE STORY. Come on, your prince or princess is waiting u somewhere, Voice out here! Feel free to email or inbox your precious confession to us. =)\nYOUTUBE.COM\nTaylor Swift - Love Story'

b'Anonymous confession #5\nTo my roommate, why do you like to do everything in the room? it\'s very distracting you know! I can\'t sleep at 9pm ( it\'s good to have an adequate sleep at night) because you become a "crocodile" on your bed doing your things with your laptop. Ever since I\'m living with you in USIA, urghhhhh...my sleep time has gotten kacau by you. You even being so obnoxious to me. I can\'t get my evening sleep and it\'s your fault for that. Your laugh (because that person likes to watch running man) is so loud and again, that disturbing my sleep. :(((\ni can\'t wait for this sem to finish. >:D'

b'Anonymous confession #4
"I wanna confess. This is something really disgusting!
Im a second year SST student now. Previously i've joint a club's activity and met some friends in the uni who are from different schools. And recently, there's this one guy started to inbox me, asking me to have "Fun" with him. And somemore, this guy was in the same room as me during the club's activity. Do i look like a gay? That's really disgusting! He actually thinks i'm one!
My advice to other guys in the uni: Please don't simply look at other guy or don't "accidentally" stare at someone. You might get lots of trouble and misunderstanding! *Still cant accept this happened to me* "'

b'#Anonymous_Confession_16636\nHai kamu.. Bukan mahu minta simpati la, cuma mahu meluah.. Saya tahu, tentang cinta ni nampak remeh.. Tapi.... Tidak boleh juga kita mnyalahkan mgsa break atau apa2 smua... Sbb kamu tiada dlm posisi dia.. Kmu tida rsa apa yg dia rsa.. Bkn dia mau pertahankan diri.. b'#Anonymous_Confession_15318
LUAHAN GRADUAN
Baru-baru ini viral berkenaan dengan statement wujudnya peluang pekerjaan sehingga 600 000 pekerjaan dan membuat andaian bahawa graduan hari ini memilih pekerjaan. Tulisan saya dibawah ini menerangkan sedikit sebanyak apa sebenarnya yang dihadapi oleh graduan..
Sebenarnya apa yang majikan inginkan daripada graduan?
Bukan apa, kebelakangan ini, isu peluang pekerjaan sering diangkat dan dibincangkan namun apa penyelesaian? Tiada. Ya sedih tapi itu realiti.. Graduan pada hari ini sudah cukup memastikan dan mempersiapkan diri mereka dengan pelbagai kemahiran namun apa yang mereka dapat? Tiada.
Cuba bayangkan, graduan hantar resume atau memohon pekerjaan, perkataan yang selalu keluar daripada majikan ialah :
"Maaf, anda tidak layak untuk jawatan ini"
"Kami memerlukan mereka yang berpengalaman Sekurang-kurangnya 3 tahun"
"Kamu over qualified untuk jawatan ini"
" Keputusan kamu terlalu cemerlang so kamu tak sesuai dengan jawatan ini"
"Saya rasa kamu ni ada peluang cerah dapat kerja yang lebih baik nanti jika kamu habiskan Degree kamu"
"Lebih baik anda balik Sbb kami nak SPM sahaja, bukan degree"
"Tunggu panggilan daripada kami"
"Kalau dalam masa tiga bulan tiada panggilan, bermaksud permohonan anda tidak berjaya"
See? Graduan pun pening nak mencari kerja.. Itu belum lagi yg tak beri feedback langsung. Ingat graduan ni tiada kerja lain. Duduk dirumah, makan dan tidur seja? At least, selaku majikan yang baik, beri sebab kepada graduan apa masalah mereka. Sekurang-kurangnya mereka tahu apa yang perlu dibetulkan. Bukan senyap bagai melihat pelamin anganku musnah.
Lagi satu benda yang aku rasa macam nak tukar ja badan aku dgn org tu.
"Graduan terlalu memilih kerja."
Kalau graduan memilih, takda maknanya SPA tu nak letak syarat "Lepasan Degree tak boleh mohon jawatan taraf SPM". Bukan itu jaa, jawatan customer service pun dia nak ada pengalaman.. Hurrmm..
Ini belum lagi campur dengan graduan Sabah dan Sarawak. Mohon di laman web majikan atau hantar resume yang mana pejabat mereka di Semenanjung, konfom akan ditolak awal2. Sebab apa? Lokaliti. Bila graduan tukar alamat guna alamat Kuala Lumpur (at least) dan mohon semula syarikat yang sama, baru dipanggil IV.. See, diskriminasi? Malah, bila mohon jawatan promoter di hypermall atau Mana2 syarikat, perkara pertama dia tanya "Mengapa tak kerja di Sabah saja. Bukan di sana lagi bagus kah?" Persoalan saya, adakah graduan yang berasal dari Sabah dan Sarawak ini tidak bagus atau setanding dengan graduan dari Semenanjung? Graduan Sabah dan Sarawak ini tak akan memohon syarikat Semenanjung kalau mereka tak nak temu duga di sana. Hurrrmm.. Yes, itu realiti hari ini.
Ada juga suara2 yang mengatakan
"Kau kerja seja dulu apa2 biarlah gaji sikit"
Satu jaa mau bagi tau, kalau gaji 400 seja, kau rasa macam mana mau survive? PTPTN seja mau 200 dibayar sebulan, blum lagi bayar sewa bilik kau, barang keperluan harian, makanan, pengangkutan. Itu bagus lagi kalau kau tinggal di rumah family, kalau mereka yang keluarganya susah, how? Ada pernah terfikir?
Kadang-kadang mulut manusia ni Suka2 jaa cakap itu ini, tapi dia tidak pernah rasa sendiri macam mana bila berada di tempat orang lain. Aduii..
Lagi satu, ada juga orang cakap2 mcam ni,
"Kau kerja dulu biasa2, cari pengalaman lepas tu bru kau boleh mohon jawatan yang sama dengan degree kau"
Errmm. Tidak tahu sudah mau cakap apa. Kalau kau kerja customer service lepas tu kau mau mohon jawatan Pegawai Alam Sekitar, kau rasa ada chance ka mau dapat tu jawatan apa lagi kau bersaing dengan mereka yang ada pengalaman dalam alam sekitar? Tidak kan? Tak payah cakap banyak, di luar sana, ada yang bekerja di luar bidang pengajian mereka bertahun2 dan bila apply jawatan yg mereka belajar di Universiti, tahu apa majikan cakap?
"Kamu tiada pengalaman dalam bidang ni. Pengalaman kamu sebagai customer service tidak boleh diguna dalam jawatan ini"
Then, kau pun kerja seja lah di situ sampai bila2..
Siapa yang tak kecewa dan sedih jika jawapan2 ini yang diterima. Tapi itulah hakikat. Namun, apa yang paling tak best didengar? Kawan kau dapat kerja dengan bantuan orang lain tanpa perlu memohon sama macam kau walhal keputusan kau lagi baik dari dia. Hahaha.. Ya, ianya berlaku.. Sbb itu sa tidak percaya bila mereka cakap "NO CABLE, semua melalui pemerhatian dan tapisan yang ketat". Orang atasan manalah tahu apa orang bawah dia buat. Orang lain semua isi borang online, dia isi borang direct trus di pejabat dan diterima. Adil ke? Tepuk dada tanya diri.
So, apa yang dapat dipelajari dari luahan ini?
Majikan seharusnya
1. Beritahu apa masalah seseorang calon itu sehingga tidak layak ditawarkan jawatan di syarikat anda.
2. Beri lah feedback at least supaya graduan tidak menunggu dan berharap.
3. Bagi peluang kepada graduan. Kamu tidak tahu graduan yang kamu tolak permohonannya itu lah sebenarnya yang akan bantu kamu lebih maju.
4. Be fair. Jangan biased.
5. Please, HARAMKAN "CABLE" ni. Mencacatkan ketelusan dan first impression'

b'#Anonymous_Confession_15318
LUAHAN GRADUAN
Baru-baru ini viral berkenaan dengan statement wujudnya peluang pekerjaan sehingga 600 000 pekerjaan dan membuat andaian bahawa graduan hari ini memilih pekerjaan. Tulisan saya dibawah ini menerangkan sedikit sebanyak apa sebenarnya yang dihadapi oleh graduan..
Sebenarnya apa yang majikan inginkan daripada graduan?
Bukan apa, kebelakangan ini, isu peluang pekerjaan sering diangkat dan dibincangkan namun apa penyelesaian? Tiada. Ya sedih tapi itu realiti.. Graduan pada hari ini sudah cukup memastikan dan mempersiapkan diri mereka dengan pelbagai kemahiran namun apa yang mereka dapat? Tiada.
Cuba bayangkan, graduan hantar resume atau memohon pekerjaan, perkataan yang selalu keluar daripada majikan ialah :
"Maaf, anda tidak layak untuk jawatan ini"
"Kami memerlukan mereka yang berpengalaman Sekurang-kurangnya 3 tahun"
"Kamu over qualified untuk jawatan ini"
" Keputusan kamu terlalu cemerlang so kamu tak sesuai dengan jawatan ini"
"Saya rasa kamu ni ada peluang cerah dapat kerja yang lebih baik nanti jika kamu habiskan Degree kamu"
"Lebih baik anda balik Sbb kami nak SPM sahaja, bukan degree"
"Tunggu panggilan daripada kami"
"Kalau dalam masa tiga bulan tiada panggilan, bermaksud permohonan anda tidak berjaya"
See? Graduan pun pening nak mencari kerja.. Itu belum lagi yg tak beri feedback langsung. Ingat graduan ni tiada kerja lain. Duduk dirumah, makan dan tidur seja? At least, selaku majikan yang baik, beri sebab kepada graduan apa masalah mereka. Sekurang-kurangnya mereka tahu apa yang perlu dibetulkan. Bukan senyap bagai melihat pelamin anganku musnah.
Lagi satu benda yang aku rasa macam nak tukar ja badan aku dgn org tu.
"Graduan terlalu memilih kerja."
Kalau graduan memilih, takda maknanya SPA tu nak letak syarat "Lepasan Degree tak boleh mohon jawatan taraf SPM". Bukan itu jaa, jawatan customer service pun dia nak ada pengalaman.. Hurrmm..
Ini belum lagi campur dengan graduan Sabah dan Sarawak. Mohon di laman web majikan atau hantar resume yang mana pejabat mereka di Semenanjung, konfom akan ditolak awal2. Sebab apa? Lokaliti. Bila graduan tukar alamat guna alamat Kuala Lumpur (at least) dan mohon semula syarikat yang sama, baru dipanggil IV.. See, diskriminasi? Malah, bila mohon jawatan promoter di hypermall atau Mana2 syarikat, perkara pertama dia tanya "Mengapa tak kerja di Sabah saja. Bukan di sana lagi bagus kah?" Persoalan saya, adakah graduan yang berasal dari Sabah dan Sarawak ini tidak bagus atau setanding dengan graduan dari Semenanjung? Graduan Sabah dan Sarawak ini tak akan memohon syarikat Semenanjung kalau mereka tak nak temu duga di sana. Hurrrmm.. Yes, itu realiti hari ini.
Ada juga suara2 yang mengatakan
"Kau kerja seja dulu apa2 biarlah gaji sikit"
Satu jaa mau bagi tau, kalau gaji 400 seja, kau rasa macam mana mau survive? PTPTN seja mau 200 dibayar sebulan, blum lagi bayar sewa bilik kau, barang keperluan harian, makanan, pengangkutan. Itu bagus lagi kalau kau tinggal di rumah family, kalau mereka yang keluarganya susah, how? Ada pernah terfikir?
Kadang-kadang mulut manusia ni Suka2 jaa cakap itu ini, tapi dia tidak pernah rasa sendiri macam mana bila berada di tempat orang lain. Aduii..
Lagi satu, ada juga orang cakap2 mcam ni,
"Kau kerja dulu biasa2, cari pengalaman lepas tu bru kau boleh mohon jawatan yang sama dengan degree kau"
Errmm. Tidak tahu sudah mau cakap apa. Kalau kau kerja customer service lepas tu kau mau mohon jawatan Pegawai Alam Sekitar, kau rasa ada chance ka mau dapat tu jawatan apa lagi kau bersaing dengan mereka yang ada pengalaman dalam alam sekitar? Tidak kan? Tak payah cakap banyak, di luar sana, ada yang bekerja di luar bidang pengajian mereka bertahun2 dan bila apply jawatan yg mereka belajar di Universiti, tahu apa majikan cakap?
"Kamu tiada pengalaman dalam bidang ni. Pengalaman kamu sebagai customer service tidak boleh diguna dalam jawatan ini"
Then, kau pun kerja seja lah di situ sampai bila2..
Siapa yang tak kecewa dan sedih jika jawapan2 ini yang diterima. Tapi itulah hakikat. Namun, apa yang paling tak best didengar? Kawan kau dapat kerja dengan bantuan orang lain tanpa perlu memohon sama macam kau walhal keputusan kau lagi baik dari dia. Hahaha.. Ya, ianya berlaku.. Sbb itu sa tidak percaya bila mereka cakap "NO CABLE, semua melalui pemerhatian dan tapisan yang ketat". Orang atasan manalah tahu apa orang bawah dia buat. Orang lain semua isi borang online, dia isi borang direct trus di pejabat dan diterima. Adil ke? Tepuk dada tanya diri.
So, apa yang dapat dipelajari dari luahan ini?
Majikan seharusnya
1. Beritahu apa masalah seseorang calon itu sehingga tidak layak ditawarkan jawatan di syarikat anda.
2. Beri lah feedback at least supaya graduan tidak menunggu dan berharap.
3. Bagi peluang kepada graduan. Kamu tidak tahu graduan yang kamu tolak permohonannya itu lah sebenarnya yang akan bantu kamu lebih maju.
4. Be fair. Jangan biased.
5. Please, HARAMKAN "CABLE" ni. Mencacatkan ketelusan dan first impression'
